description: Aster 'Wood's Pink' is an amazing plant species. Its visually captivating blooms of delicate, lavender-pink petals are exquisite against lush green foliage. This perennial is quite versatile, able to thrive in many soil types, making it a great choice for any garden. It can be sown directly into the garden, or started indoors in containers. Preferring full sun, this variety can easily tolerate some shade. It re-blooms throughout the season and is a great source of late-season nectar for many pollinators. Low maintenance and easy to care for, Aster 'Wood's Pink' is an excellent choice for any garden.
